_header.purpose: Grafana home dashboard serving as the navigation hub for the observability stack
_header.scope: Default landing page linking to all observability dashboards (Golden Signals, RED, Web Vitals, USE, Traces, Profiling)
_header.overview: Provides a centralized navigation hub for the Grafana observability stack. Displays system health status panels and links to all specialized dashboards. Configured as the default home dashboard in grafana.ini. Uses stat panels for quick health indicators and text panels with markdown links for dashboard navigation.
_header.dependencies: Grafana 11.4+, Mimir datasource for health metrics, all other dashboards for navigation links
_header.exports: Default home dashboard loaded on Grafana startup
_header.related: grafana.ini, dashboard-provisioning.yml, golden-signals-overview.json, backend-red-method.json, frontend-web-vitals.json, infrastructure-use-method.json, trace-analysis.json, profiling.json
_header.implementation: Grafana dashboard JSON schema version 39 with stat and text panels for navigation

title: Durable Code - Observability Home
description: Navigation hub for all observability dashboards

options.content:
### Metrics Dashboards
- [Golden Signals Overview](/grafana/d/golden-signals-overview) - Latency, Traffic, Errors, Saturation
- [Backend RED Method](/grafana/d/backend-red-method) - Rate, Errors, Duration per endpoint
- [Frontend Web Vitals](/grafana/d/frontend-web-vitals) - LCP, INP, CLS, JS errors
- [Infrastructure USE Method](/grafana/d/infrastructure-use-method) - Utilization, Saturation, Errors

### Tracing & Profiling
- [Trace Analysis](/grafana/d/trace-analysis) - Trace search, service graph, span analysis
- [Profiling](/grafana/d/profiling) - CPU and memory flame graphs

### Explore
- [Explore Metrics](/grafana/explore?orgId=1&left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22mimir%22%7D) - Ad-hoc metric queries
- [Explore Logs](/grafana/explore?orgId=1&left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22loki%22%7D) - Log search and analysis
- [Explore Traces](/grafana/explore?orgId=1&left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22%7D) - Trace search by ID
- [Explore Profiles](/grafana/explore?orgId=1&left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22pyroscope%22%7D) - Profile analysis

### Architecture
- **Metrics**: Mimir (Prometheus-compatible)
- **Logs**: Loki (LogQL)
- **Traces**: Tempo (TraceQL)
- **Profiles**: Pyroscope (flame graphs)
- **Collector**: Alloy (OTLP + Faro)
